info.description: TON Index collects data from a full node to PostgreSQL database and provides convenient API to an indexed blockchain.
info.title: TON Index (Go)

get.description: Query account states

parameters.description: List of addresses in any form. Maximum 1000 addresses allowed.
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Include code and data BOCs. Default: true
parameters.name: include_boc

get.description: Get actions by specified filter.

parameters.description: List of account addresses to get actions. Can be sent in hex, base64 or base64url form.
parameters.name: account

parameters.description: Find actions by transaction hash.
parameters.name: tx_hash

parameters.description: Find actions by message hash.
parameters.name: msg_hash

parameters.description: Find actions by the action_id.
parameters.name: action_id

parameters.description: Find actions by the trace_id.
parameters.name: trace_id

parameters.description: Query actions of traces which was completed in masterchain block with given seqno
parameters.name: mc_seqno

parameters.description: Query actions for traces with `trace_end_utime >= start_utime`.
parameters.name: start_utime

parameters.description: Query actions for traces with `trace_end_utime <= end_utime`.
parameters.name: end_utime

parameters.description: Query actions for traces with `trace_end_lt >= start_lt`.
parameters.name: start_lt

parameters.description: Query actions for traces with `trace_end_lt <= end_lt`.
parameters.name: end_lt

parameters.description: Include action types.
parameters.name: action_type

parameters.description: Exclude action types.
parameters.name: exclude_action_type

parameters.description: Supported action types
parameters.name: supported_action_types

parameters.description: Include accounts array for each action in response.
parameters.name: include_accounts

parameters.description: Include `transactions_full` array with detailed transaction data for each action in response.
parameters.name: include_transactions

parameters.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Sort actions by lt.
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Query address book

parameters.description: List of addresses in any form to get address book. Max: 1024.
parameters.name: address

get.description: Get smart contract information.

parameters.description: Account address in any form.
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Use method from api/v2. Not recommended
parameters.name: use_v2

get.description: Get parent and/or children for specified transaction.

parameters.description: Transaction hash.
parameters.name: hash

parameters.description: Direction of message.
parameters.name: direction

get.description: Returns blocks by specified filters.

parameters.description: Block workchain.
parameters.name: workchain

parameters.description: Block shard id. Must be sent with *workchain*. Example: `8000000000000000`.
parameters.name: shard

parameters.description: Block block seqno. Must be sent with *workchain* and *shard*.
parameters.name: seqno

parameters.description: Block root hash.
parameters.name: root_hash

parameters.description: Block file hash.
parameters.name: file_hash

parameters.description: Masterchain block seqno
parameters.name: mc_seqno

parameters.description: Query blocks with generation UTC timestamp **after** given timestamp.
parameters.name: start_utime

parameters.description: Query blocks with generation UTC timestamp **before** given timestamp.
parameters.name: end_utime

parameters.description: Query blocks with `lt >= start_lt`.
parameters.name: start_lt

parameters.description: Query blocks with `lt <= end_lt`.
parameters.name: end_lt

parameters.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Sort results by UTC timestamp.
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Decode opcodes and message bodies. Opcodes can be in hex (with or without 0x prefix) or decimal format. Bodies should be in base64 or hex format.

parameters.description: List of opcodes to decode (hex or decimal)
parameters.name: opcodes

parameters.description: List of message bodies to decode (base64 or hex)
parameters.name: bodies

post.description: Decode opcodes and message bodies. Opcodes can be in hex (with or without 0x prefix) or decimal format. Bodies should be in base64 or hex format. Use POST method for long parameters that may be truncated in GET requests.

parameters.description: Decode request
parameters.name: request

get.description: Query DNS records by specified filters. Currently .ton and .t.me DNS are supported.

parameters.description: Wallet address in any form. DNS records that contain this address in wallet category will be returned.
parameters.name: wallet

parameters.description: Domain name to search for. DNS records with this exact domain name will be returned.
parameters.name: domain

parameters.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.
parameters.name: offset

post.description: Estimate fees required for query processing. Fields body, init-code and init-data accepted in serialized format (b64-encoded).

parameters.description: Estimate fee request.
parameters.name: request

get.description: Get Jetton wallets by specified filters

parameters.description: Jetton wallet address in any form. Max: 1000.

parameters.description: Address of Jetton wallet's owner in any form. Max: 1000.
parameters.name: owner_address

parameters.description: Jetton Master in any form.
parameters.name: jetton_address

parameters.description: Exclude jetton wallets with 0 balance.
parameters.name: exclude_zero_balance

get.description: Get masterchain block shard state. Same as /api/v2/shards.

parameters.description: Masterchain block seqno.
parameters.name: seqno

get.description: Get first and last indexed block

post.description: Send an external message to the TON network.

parameters.description: Message in boc base64 format.
parameters.name: boc

get.description: Get messages by specified filters.

parameters.description: Message hash. Acceptable in hex, base64 and base64url forms.
parameters.name: msg_hash

parameters.description: Hash of message body.
parameters.name: body_hash

parameters.description: The source account address. Can be sent in hex, base64 or base64url form. Use value `null` to get external messages.
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: The destination account address. Can be sent in hex, base64 or base64url form. Use value `null` to get log messages.
parameters.name: destination

parameters.description: Opcode of message in hex or signed 32-bit decimal form.
parameters.name: opcode

parameters.description: Query messages with `created_at >= start_utime`.
parameters.name: start_utime

parameters.description: Query messages with `created_at >= start_utime`.
parameters.name: end_utime

parameters.description: Query messages with `created_lt >= start_lt`.
parameters.name: start_lt

parameters.description: Query messages with `created_lt <= end_lt`.
parameters.name: end_lt

parameters.description: Direction of message.
parameters.name: direction

parameters.description: Exclude external messages.
parameters.name: exclude_externals

parameters.description: Return only external messages.
parameters.name: only_externals

parameters.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Sort transactions by lt. If set to `desc`, you better set `start_lt = 1` to get latest messages.
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: List of addresses in any form to get address metadata. Max: 1024.

parameters.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Sort orders by last_transaction_lt.
parameters.name: sort

get.description: Get multisig contracts by specified filters with associated orders

parameters.description: Address of signer or proposer wallet in any form. Max: 1024.

parameters.description: Limit number of queried rows. Use with *offset* to batch read.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Skip first N rows. Use with *limit* to batch read.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Sort multisigs by last_transaction_lt.

get.description: Get wallet smart contract information. The following wallets are supported: `v1r1`, `v1r2`, `v1r3`, `v2r1`, `v2r2`, `v3r1`, `v3r2`, `v4r1`, `v4r2`, `v5beta`, `v5r1`. In case the account is not a wallet error code 409 is returned.

parameters.description: Account address in any form.
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Use method from api/v2. Not recommended
parameters.name: use_v2

get.description: Query wallet information

parameters.description: List of addresses in any form. Maximum 1000 addresses allowed.
parameters.name: address
